author: kfogel
msg: Merge some trunk changes into 1.0, remove them from STATUS:
Approved by: mbk, bliss, ghudson, rooneg
Remove svnserve -u client and server code.
Approved by: jerenkrantz, rooneg, ghudson, epg
Approved by: bliss, mbk, rooneg, jszakmeister, epg
Fix an svnserve crash bug for network errors.
Approved by: bliss, mbk, ghudson, rooneg, jszakmeister, epg
Make svnserve require --inetd to use stdin/stdout, etc.

author: kfogel
msg: Make svnserve show an error message and usage if it is run without any
arguments.  Add a new -i/--inetd option to make svnserve use
stdin/stdout (which was the old default).  Add a new --foreground
option to prevent svnserve from daemonizing (which is useful for
This is Tobias Ringstrom's patch from issue #1681.
(main): Use run_mode instead of several booleans.  Show error
message and usage if no mode is selected.  Handle the new inetd
Updated to match the changes to subversion/svnserve/main.c.
